casebody.data:
Bruns
v.
Bryant, et al. 282P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016.

Ms. Jenny Bruns, Pro Se.

Mr. Joseph Finarelli, Mr. Thomas M. Woodward, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, For State of North Carolina, et al.

Mr. John I. Malone, Jr., Attorney at Law, For USAA.

Mr. Philip H. Cheatwood, Attorney at Law, For Bryant, Dalton (Jr.)

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of September 2016 by Plaintiff to Reconsider Petition for Discretionary Review Under N.C.G.S. 7A-31 (a) and Writ of Mandamus Under Rule 22:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
